column1: '''''The Tolkien Relation: A Personal Inquiry''''' is a book by [[William Ready]], the former Director of Libraries at [[Marquette University]]. The paperback edition of [[1969]] was renamed into '''Understanding Tolkien and ''The Lord of the Rings'''''.<ref name="Ake">[[Ã…ke Bertenstam]],  "[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]" at [[Forodrim]]</ref>

column2: Christopher]], as well as some unattributed quotes. See especially pp. 55-56 and 57-60 (1st edition).<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'', at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
